description: Name Necklace: A Timeless Personalized Jewelry TrendName necklaces have emerged as a timeless and popular trend in personalized jewelry, offering individuals a stylish and meaningful way to express their identity. These necklaces feature the wearer's name, initials, or a significant word, crafted into an elegant and customizable pendant. In this article, we'll delve into the enduring appeal of name necklaces, their customization options, and how they've become a beloved accessory for people of all ages.The Enduring Appeal of Name Necklaces:Name necklaces have stood the test of time, remaining a cherished jewelry staple for decades. Their timeless elegance and personal significance make them a favorite choice for individuals seeking to adorn themselves with a meaningful accessory.Personalization and Individuality:At the heart of the name necklace trend is the desire for personalization and self-expression. By wearing a necklace adorned with their name or initials, individuals can showcase their unique identity and celebrate their individuality.Customization Options:Name necklaces come in a variety of styles and materials, offering ample customization options to suit every taste and preference. From classic script fonts to modern block letters, and from precious metals like gold and silver to more affordable options, there's a name necklace to match any style and budget.Meaningful Gifts:Name necklaces make thoughtful and sentimental gifts for loved ones on special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries, and graduations. Giving a personalized necklace demonstrates thoughtfulness and consideration, creating a lasting memento that holds sentimental value.A Symbol of Connection:Wearing a name necklace can symbolize various connections and relationships in one's life. It may represent the wearer's own identity, commemorate the name of a loved one, or serve as a reminder of a meaningful word or mantra.Versatility in Styling:Name necklaces are incredibly versatile and can be styled in numerous ways to suit different outfits and occasions. Whether worn alone as a statement piece or layered with other necklaces for a trendy look, they add a touch of elegance and personal flair to any ensemble.Celebrities and Influencers:The popularity of name necklaces has been further fueled by celebrities and influencers who often showcase their personalized jewelry on social media platforms. Their endorsement has helped propel the trend into the mainstream and inspire countless individuals to embrace name necklaces as a must-have accessory.Conclusion:Name necklaces are more than just pieces of jewelry; they're symbols of identity, individuality, and connection. With their timeless appeal, customizable designs, and versatile styling options, name necklaces have become a beloved accessory for people of all ages. Whether worn as a personal statement or gifted as a meaningful gesture, name necklaces continue to captivate hearts and adorn necklines around the world, leaving a lasting impression wherever they go.O U R ∙ S E R V I C EWe accept return and exchange if there is any quality issues, please feel free to contact us if you if you have any concern with the customized necklace. and we will reply to you within 24 hours to ensure that you enjoy the wonderful shopping experience. your satisfaction is all we pursue.R E T U R N & R E F U N D• I guarantee to make a new one for any quality issues, Unfortunately, I cannot guarantee user errors.• If the order has not been sent yet, I can refund if you want.• I cannot return or refund the products made and sent.• I focused on being satisfied and happy to my valued customers. so if there is any problem please contact me first.I would be pleased.M O R E ∙ F R O M ∙ U Swww.etsy.com/shop/HoneyPersonalized

title: Whiskey Making Kit, DIY Cocktail Infusions For Adults, Valentine Gifts For Men, Make Your Own Personalized Bourbon, Unique Barware For Him
description: WHISKEY INFUSION KIT by Crafted InfusionsWelcome to Crafted Infusions! We're a husband-and-wife team based in Atlanta, and we create handmade gifts for adventurous spirits. Our DIY alcohol infusion kits have made a five-star splash at everything from birthday parties, PhD graduations, and holiday gift exchanges to groomsmen proposals, wedding anniversaries, and real estate closings.EVERY WHISKEY INFUSION KIT INCLUDES:• (12) BOTANICALS — 100% natural with no artificial flavors and no added sugar (see our FAQs below for a complete list)• (5) INFUSION SATCHELS — plastic-free & compost-safe• (5) RECIPE CARDS — instructions for five infusions (and five cocktails!) with space to review your personalized spirits• (1) INSTRUCTIONS CARD — simple, straightforward instructions for every step of the infusion process and flavor profiles for each botanical ingredient• (2) REUSABLE WOODEN COCKTAIL STIRRERS — laser-cut from 1/8" Baltic birch, hand-sanded, and finished with food-safe Danish oil* Alcohol, glassware, and other props featured in our product photos are *NOT* included.— FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS —[ WHAT MAKES CRAFTED INFUSIONS UNIQUE? ] 🇺🇸 WE ARE GENUINELY HANDMADE IN THE USA • Every Crafted Infusions kit is handmade by the two of us in our Atlanta, GA workshop. 🌿 Rather than ordering pre-made infusion kits from overseas manufacturers on Al!baba like many other Etsy sellers, the two of us fill every tube, fold every box, assemble every kit, and ship every order ourselves. 🌎 WE PRIORITIZE PEOPLE & THE PLANET • We source our materials from other small American businesses whenever possible. ♻️ To lessen our environmental impact, we package each infusion kit in a 100% recycled and recyclable box printed with non-toxic algae ink, and we reuse every piece of protective filler we receive (think bubble wrap, air pockets, and kraft paper) when packing orders. 📦[ WHAT TYPE OF WHISKEY SHOULD I INFUSE? ] We recommend a BOURBON, RYE, or TENNESSEE WHISKEY 🥃 with a minimum ABV of 45% and a price tag under $50. If you've got a local distillery nearby, give their spirits a shot! If not, Drizly's bestsellers are a great place to start your search.[ WHAT BOTANICALS ARE INCLUDED? ] 🍊 The 12 botanicals included in our whiskey infusion kit are  (1) allspice berries, (2) American oak chips, (3) black peppercorns, (4) cacao nibs, (5) chili peppers, (6) cinnamon chips, (7) French oak chips, (8) ginger root, (9) grapefruit peel, (10) hibiscus flowers, (11) orange peel, and (12) spearmint leaf. 🌿[ HOW MUCH WHISKEY CAN ONE KIT INFUSE? ] In general, we recommend using up to 2 total tablespoons of botanicals per 8 ounces of whiskey. Following that guideline, one kit can infuse at least seven 750mL bottles.[ WHEN WILL MY ORDER ARRIVE? ] 📍 To check how long it normally takes for a package to travel from our location to yours, search "30316" on the official USPS Priority Mail delivery map >> usps.com/priority-mail/map[ WHAT’S MY TRACKING NUMBER? ] Once your order ships, Etsy will email you a link to track its progress online.[ DO YOU OFFER FREE SHIPPING? ] Yes! 📦 Orders over $35 ship free via USPS Ground Advantage (3-5 business^ days). Need it faster? Free shipping can be upgraded to USPS Priority Mail (1-3 business^ days) or USPS Priority Mail Express (1-2 business days). ^business days do NOT include weekends or federal holidays.[ CAN I CANCEL MY ORDER? ] Yes, you can cancel your order *BEFORE* its status is updated to "Pre-Transit."  At that point, your order is already en route to our local post office and cannot be canceled.[ WHAT'S YOUR REFUND POLICY? ] Refunds are available ONLY when an item is damaged^ during transit **AND** we receive the USPS-required photos that will allow us to file an insurance claim. When requesting a refund or replacement due to shipping damage, please include (1) at least one photo of the external shipping box with the shipping label visible and (2) at least one photo that clearly shows ALL of the products you received. We cannot offer you a refund if we do not receive these photos. 🚫 PLEASE NOTE: SHIPPING COSTS ARE NON-REFUNDABLE.[ DO YOU ACCEPT RETURNS? ] Our infusion kits are handmade and consumable so we unfortunately cannot accept returns. Instead, we recommend gifting your kit to a whiskey-loving friend, relative, or colleague. 🎁

description: A ceramic lamp in light and homely colorCombines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green with a slight touch of orange-red on top.Made by hand in a small boutique studio in Tel AvivThis lamp is 7.9-inch \ 24 cm in height (without the bulb) and 7.9-inch \ 20 cm diameter.It comes with 60 inches \ 150 cm golden textile cable and a terracotta 4-inch \ 10 cm ceiling rose.it is suitable for standard E27 bulb, Voltage 110V-250V | 25 to 40W maxEnergy-saving LED light bulbs are recommended.The bulb in the picture is a LED Edison Vintage style Bulb.Note that the bulb is not included.this product is made to order by hand so that it may be slightly different from the one in the photoplease allow 1-2 weeks production time before shipping.This object can be ordered in various colors and prints. Talk to me for more info.This piece is part of the Apilar collection.The Apilar collection (Stack in Spanish) began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the Differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection, there are nine different shapes from which all structures of the collection are built. Countless creation options are formed by stacking the shapes one on top of the other into a new complex with spectacular colors.
